title: Feature request: dropout with noise_shape does not support varied batchsize
body_html: Since it's convenient to support varied batchsize in tf.placeholder by setting the head element of argument "shape" to None, tf.nn.dropout does not allow None in its argument "noise_shape", leading to models using dropout with noise_shape cumbersome to implement varied batchsize. I wonder is it possible to allow None in noise_shape for better support for varied batchsize? Thank you!
